scenario_text.value: Damn it... This guy’s a tough one...!

Damn it... I can’t believe I’m getting pushed
back!

That he could inflict such damage upon my
immortal frame... I admit, he’s a tough one.

Urgh, I’ve suffered too many attacks. I can’t
believe I let it come to this!

Kaito, my partner, I fear at this rate there
is no end in sight.

Haha! Listen to you! I never took you for a
whiner!
But you’re right. This is tough.
Kaito! Pull back for now!
Don’t push it! You need to be there for Miu!
Takuma, thanks for the concern, but...

...I refuse to put Miu in any kind of danger.
So I am not falling back.
I’m here for Miu. I’m here to keep her safe.
So there is no way I’m going to lose!!!
Kaito...!
Let’s do this, Dracmon!
Leave it to me!
Sangloupmon, you got any fight left in you?
You better believe it!
Myotismon, time to show off what you’ve got!
As you wish. Graaah!!!

Time to get up and get back in there,
Beelzemon!
You bet!

Boltboutamon, time to crush anyone who tries
to get in our way!

Heheheh... Your wish for utter destruction is
my command, my dear partner!
